casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth D. BOBBITT. No. 667P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of May 2006 by Defendant to proceed in forma pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006."
